alert.note: Alert for Howell; Oregon; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:21PM CST until January 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to a half inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Howell, Oregon, and Shannon Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM Saturday to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening and Monday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear layered clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
